name: Ersta, Friend to All
text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 Human Wizard creature token that's all colors.
[−3]: Choose a card name from among Enlightened Tutor, Mystical Tutor, Booster Tutor, Imperial Recruiter, and Worldy Tutor. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
[−8]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more Wizards, you win the game."
Ersta, Friend to All can be your commander.
